name: Singed

sources.import_notes: Generated baseline canonical champion file from From Online dataset.

notes: Ability effects are intentionally minimal placeholders until scripted modeling is added.

passive.name: Noxious Slipstream
passive.description: Innate: Whenever  Singed moves near a  champion, he gains  bonus movement speed for a short time, which refreshes on subsequent passes and  stacks up to a cap.
passive.description_source: Innate: Whenever  Singed moves near a  champion, he gains  bonus movement speed for a short time, which refreshes on subsequent passes and  stacks up to a cap.

basic_ability_1.name: Poison Trail
basic_ability_1.description: Toggle:  Singed continually creates a toxic cloud that shortly lingers in his wake, which continually inflicts  poison to enemies within.
basic_ability_1.description_source:
Toggled abilities do not count as ability activations for the purposes of on-cast effects such as  Spellblade and triggering  Force Pulse's passive.
When Poison Trail's debuff is applied instead of refreshed, the target is dealt one additional instance of the debuff at the same time as the application. This is done by delaying the actual debuff by 0.1 seconds.
If the target is already affected by the debuff, its duration is refreshed to the maximum (2 seconds).
While active after spawning, a cloud checks for valid targets who remain in or re-enter a cloud every 0.25 seconds.
Valid targets already afflicted with the poison will have their debuff's duration refreshed every 0.25 seconds if applicable.
If Singed has moved fewer than 90 units since spawning the last poison cloud, it will spawn 35 units in front of him. They also only spawn every 1 second in this case.
When Singed is moving faster than that, the poison clouds spawn more frequently and on top of himself.

basic_ability_2.name: Mega Adhesive
basic_ability_2.description: Active:  Singed creates a field of adhesive at the target location for a short time that  grounds and  slows enemies within.
basic_ability_2.description_source:
The goo missile is VFX only, to convey which location Singed threw the adhesive at. It has a fixed travel time but is independent from when the zone is established. It is not destructible by effects such as  Wind Wall.
Mega Adhesive's  slow and  ground debuffs are each marked as non-dispellable, so they are not removed by most  cleanses. Each is however allowed to be removed by cleanses that also grant immunity to the debuff type, such as  Olaf's  Ragnarok.

basic_ability_3.name: Fling
basic_ability_3.description: Active:  Singed  flings the target enemy, dealing magic damage based on their maximum health.
basic_ability_3.description_source:
Fling can throw enemies over walls (circumstances permitting).
 Slow-immune enemies will not be  rooted when flung into  Mega Adhesive.
Fling is special cased to not  fling  Warwick while Singed is  suppressed by  Infinite Duress after the cast time.
If the target becomes  untargetable,  dies, or is too far away or no longer in  sight during the cast time, this ability will cancel but does not go on  cooldown nor pay its cost (if applicable).

ultimate.name: Insanity Potion
ultimate.description: Active:  Singed empowers himself for some time with  bonus ability power,  bonus armor,  bonus magic resist,  bonus movement speed,  bonus health regen, and  bonus mana regen.
